verses.roman:
iti-uti anveṣiyā siṁha-dvāre gelā
gābhī-gaṇa-madhye yāi' prabhure pāilā

synonyms: iti-uti—here and there; anveṣiyā—searching; siṁha-dvāre—to the gate named Siṁha-dvāra; gelā—went; gābhī-gaṇa-madhye—among the cows; yāi'-going; prabhure pāilā—found Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: After searching here and there, they finally came to the cow shed near the Siṁha-dvāra. There they saw Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu lying unconscious among the cows.
